QuestData.Title: Stepping Up Surveillance
QuestData.Description: The cultists appear to be digging out the remains of a being known as Soggoth the Slitherer.$B$BPerhaps their superiors on the rafters above have more information.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sneak into the Master's Glaive using the Panther Figurine and spy on the Twilight's Hammer leaders on the platform above.
QuestData.RewardText: This is dire news, $n. If you are correct, then we'd best act swiftly and decisively.$B$BWe cannot allow this "Soggoth" to be brought back to life.
